name: Modin* Getting Started
description: This sample illustrates how to use Modin* accelerated Pandas functions and notes the performance gain when compared to standard Pandas functions

env: uv run ipython kernel install --user --name modin_getting_started
steps: uv run jupyter nbconvert --ExecutePreprocessor.enabled=True --ExecutePreprocessor.kernel_name=modin_getting_started --to notebook Modin_GettingStarted.ipynb
